text: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
author: Jane D. Hull

text: Don't try to make children grow up to be like you, or they may do it.
author: Russell Baker

text: Girls are the future mothers of our society, and it is important that we focus on their well-being.
author: Miriam Makeba

text: I think a dad has to make his daughter feel that he's genuinely interested in what she's going through.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

text: Nothing you do for children is ever wasted. They seem not to notice us, hovering, averting our eyes, and they seldom offer thanks, but what we do for them is never wasted.
author: Garrison Keillor
